Name: Stream Animals: Free For All
About the game: ** Stream Animals only works for Twitch.tv Streamers ** Stream Animals brings you closer to your streaming community. Take on your viewers and try to be the last one standing as the land gives way beneath you. Your viewers use your streaming channel chat to decide their moves. Then the fun begins as random or voted events trigger falling blocks, player fights, or birds swooping from above! As the last animal standing, it doesn’t always mean you’re the winner. If the birds and players don’t get you, events can still take you out! For Non-Streamers: If you'd like to customize your appearance for when you join streams on Twitch, there is an in-game store and customization section. Features Play with your stream chat through Twitch. Viewers can vote on events. 3 Game Modes: Classic, Battle, and Dash Up to 64 players from your stream chat. Map size scaling based on player count. 15+ Events that can be toggled on/off 10+ Map Layouts for Classic Mode with 3 scaling sizes 10+ Map Themes for Classic Mode.
